The purpose of this vignette is to show how the seminal `svy_*()` functions of this package works. The package contains the `design` object which is a `srvyr` design constructed from the `main` dataset also included in the package. 

```{r setup}
# Load package
library(impactR.analysis)
data(design)
```


# Mean and median

```{r, mean}
svy_mean(design, c_total_3_17_femmes, group = c("admin1", "milieu"))
svy_median(design, c_total_3_17_femmes, group = c("admin1", "milieu")) 
svy_prop(design, h_2_type_latrine, c("milieu"))
```
